title: 2 1/2 = Two-and-a-half
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Child development
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Child psychology
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Child development
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Child psychology
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Social interaction in children
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Social interaction in children
description: A revealing study of two two-and-a-half year old children at play indoors on a winter afternoon, without adult surveillance or interference. Records every playful antic, every friction, and every laughing word or sound of protest.
